10
11#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/spectrum_buffer.h"
12
13#include <algorithm>
14
15namespace webrtc {
16
17SpectrumBuffer::SpectrumBuffer(size_t size, size_t num_channels)
18 : size(static_cast<int>(size)),
19 buffer(size,
20 std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>(num_channels)) {
21 for (auto& channel : buffer) {
22 for (auto& c : channel) {
23 std::fill(c.begin(), c.end(), 0.f);
24 }
25 }
26}
27
28SpectrumBuffer::~SpectrumBuffer() = default;
29
30} // namespace webrtc
31
